title: Throne and Liberty Tier List
description: This tier list for Throne and Liberty will help you choose the best weapons for your playstyle.
heading: Throne and Liberty Tier List
introText: This tier list for Throne and Liberty will help you choose the best weapons for your playstyle.

data.itemDescription: This is a versatile weapon combination that is good for both PvE and PvP. The Longbow is great for dealing damage from a distance, while the Dagger is good for close-quarters combat
This is a powerful weapon that is good for both PvE and PvP. It is especially effective against groups of enemies
This is a versatile weapon that is good for both PvE and PvP. It is easy to use and has a long range
This is a powerful weapon that is good for PvE. However, it is slow and can be difficult to use in PvP
This is a versatile weapon that is good for both PvE and PvP. It is a good choice for players who want to be able to defend themselves and deal damage
This is a powerful weapon that is good for PvE. However, it is slow and can be difficult to use in PvP
This is a slow weapon that is good for stunning enemies. However, it is not very effective at dealing damage
This is a slow weapon that is not very effective in either PvE or PvP
This is a fast weapon that is good for dealing damage in close-quarters combat. However, it is not very effective against armored enemies
